name: Babyman VS Nappy Bird ZX
description:
Babyman VS Nappy Bird is a follow up to Baby-Man Vs Man-Baby by @puttycad & @100tinsoldiers

Hero Henry McMannish-man was transformed into an under-cover baby called Walter "pee-pee" Kay (AKA Baby-Man) and sent back through time to deal with a terrible tantrumming tyrant.  Unfortunately for him after his mission was over the “Baby-Man” has become stuck in the past until the professor can figure out why and get him back to the present!

While Baby-man is stuck at the nursery you decide to steal his nappy from the washing line. You’ll never outfly him as he’s built walls to block you and will eventually catch up with you. SEE HOW FAR YOU CAN FLY!

CONTROLS:

Space bar - Flap your wings
Z - Fire an egg

CREDITS:

Ric Lumb (PuttyCAD) - Graphics

Nigel Critten (100TinSoldiers) - Programming

PUBLISHED BY PuttyCAD/100TinSoldiers

Special Thanks:

MPAGD Engine: by Jonathan Cauldwell Multi-Platform Arcade Game Designer by Jonathan Cauldwell (itch.io)
